means: 报答( requite的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I requited him for his help with a present.
sentence.Network_cn: 我送他一份礼以答谢他的帮助.

sentence.Network_en: His kindness was requited with cold contempt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的好意被报以[遭致]冷淡的轻蔑.

sentence.Network_en: He requited his employer's unfairness with his resignation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以辞职来报复雇主对他的不公平的待遇.

PerfectNetExp.abs: [Met asung hero„? 未译，不解。] 你是否谈过“有回应的(requited)”恋爱？[unrequited love“不回应的爱情”，指“单相思”。不存在requited.
The Queen requited his services with a knighthood ., 女王为表彰他的贡献封他为爵士.
The poem is far too beautiful requited here ., 这首诗太美了 , 这里还要引用一下.

list.abs: requite是什么意思|requite的中文意思... ... Requite Favours ： 报恩 requite with ： 书报答 Requite Gratitude ： 酬答恩德.
Something given as requital or recompense ; a repayment ., 报偿给予作为回报或补偿的东西 ; 报偿.
I represent all of the children to guarantee : we'll study hard to requite you !我代表所有的孩子们保证：我们会努力学习来报答您！
Did she requite your love ?, 她有没有报答你的爱?

auth_sentence.content: She, too, however, enjoyed a requited passion.
auth_sentence.res_content: She, too, however, enjoyed a requited passion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She, too, however, enjoyed a requited passion.

auth_sentence.content: Collectively, the three songs sound as beautiful as the revelation that a secret love is elatedly requited.
auth_sentence.res_content: Collectively, the three songs sound as beautiful as the revelation that a secret love is elatedly requited.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Collectively, the three songs sound as beautiful as the revelation that a secret love is elatedly requited.
